Note : The turret will search for targets in a 180 degree arc facing *you* when you place it. Requires 10 power.

name: Wood Double Door
description: A Cheap door to secure your base. Its vulnerability to fire and weak explosive resistance makes the door a temporary solution to securing your base. Due to its flaws you should look at upgrading to a higher tier door such as Sheet Metal.The Wooden Door can take two kinds of locks the basic Key Lock and the Code Lock. To pick up the door, remove any locks and open, hold down the E (USE) key and select 'Pickup'.

name: Industrial Door
description: Medium strength door, vulnerable to explosives.

name: Sheet Metal Door
description: Medium strength door, vulnerable to explosives.

name: Armored Door
description: Extremely strong door with a hatch to see and shoot out of.

name: Wooden Door
description: A Cheap door to secure your base. Its vulnerability to fire and weak explosive resistance makes the door a temporary solution to securing your base. Due to its flaws you should look at upgrading to a higher tier door such as Sheet Metal.The Wooden Door can take two kinds of locks the basic Key Lock and the Code Lock. To pick up the door, remove any locks and open, hold down the E (USE) key and select 'Pickup'.

name: Door Key
description: A key to a door, created from a Lock. Keep this item safe; if lost you'll be unable to open the door again!

name: Dragon Door Knocker
description: A heavy brass door knocker

name: Drone
description: A remote controlled drone.

name: Junkyard Drum Kit
description: An array of pots, pans and buckets that passes as a serviceable Drum Kit. Three cymbals, some Tom Drums and a Kick Drum means you can easily lay down a beat.

name: Duct Tape
description: A versatile adhesive tape reinforced with cloth.

name: Bronze Egg
description: A Bronze Egg. Open for a surprise or collect 10 to upgrade to a silver egg.

name: Gold Egg
description: A Gold Egg. Containing the best easter loot.

name: Painted Egg
description: Some simple painted eggs. Collect 10 to upgrade to a bronze egg

name: Silver Egg
description: A Silver Egg. Contains medium level loot, Collect 10 to upgrade to a gold Egg

description: An easter egg basket. Equip to pick up eggs during an easter egg hunt with left click. Use right click to throw

name: Easter Door Wreath
description: A beautiful, hand crafted Easter themed door wreath.

name: AND Switch
description: A logic gate that allows electrical passthrough if BOTH inputs receives power, passthrough amount is the greater of either power source

name: Audio Alarm
description: A speaker which will emit a loud warning alarm when powered

name: Large Rechargeable Battery
description: A Large Rechargeable Battery. Must have a minimum charge of 5 seconds to discharge. Can be wired in series. Charging rate is dependant on power in, with a maximum of 80% efficiency.

name: Medium Rechargeable Battery
description: A Medium Rechargable Battery. Must have a minimum charge of 5 seconds to discharge. Can be wired in series. Charging rate is dependant on power in, with a maximum of 80% efficiency.

name: Small Rechargeable Battery
description: A small rechargable battery. Must have a minimum charge of 5 seconds to discharge. Can be wired in series. Charging rate is dependant on power in, with a maximum of 80% efficiency.

name: Blocker
description: This object prevents passthrough while power is received through its second input.

name: Button
description: A simple electric button.

name: Cable Tunnel
description: Allows you to pass a cable through a wall. Each input will forward the amount it receives to the corresponding output on the other side.

name: Counter
description: A basic cathode ray tube screen combined with an incremental counter. Can display power received, or can count upwards and allow passthrough when a target is reached.

name: Door Controller
description: A Door Controller. Will manipulate the state of the closest door when it receives power

name: Flasher Light
description: A flashing blue light

name: Small Generator
description: A small electric generator powered by Low Grade Fuel that outputs 40 power.

name: Electric Furnace
description: An electrical version of a furnace that uses electricity instead of a fuel source.

name: Test Generator
description: A Mailbox that accepts notes. Only you can access the mail due to a one way slit.

name: HBHF Sensor
description: A Heartbeat, Breathing, Humidity and Footstep sensor. Passthrough is equal to the number of humans detected in a 10m radius

name: Electric Heater
description: Provides warmth in a radius when on

name: Igniter
description: Ignites nearby objects such as furnaces and campfires when power is received

name: Laser Detector
description: A gate which allows power to flow while a player is in the beam

name: OR Switch
description: A logic gate that allows electrical passthrough if EITHER input receives power, passthrough amount is the greater of either power source

name: Pressure Pad
description: A gate which allows power to flow while a player is standing on it

name: RAND Switch
description: This switch will allow passthrough based on a random number. Each time the SET input receives power it will roll true or false to allow passthrough

name: RF Broadcaster
description: An RF Broadcaster

name: RF Receiver
description: An RF Receiver

name: Simple Light
description: A simple debugging light

name: Siren Light
description: A spinning siren light

name: Large Solar Panel
description: A solar panel which converts sunlight into energy. The amount of energy generated is dependent on the sun's intensity and angle to the panel.

name: Splitter
description: Splits an electrical signal into 3 multiple signals. the amount passed through is equal to the input amount divided by the number of used output slots.

name: Sprinkler
description: A small sprinkler that sprays water around it. Requires a hose connection to supply it with water.

name: Switch
description: A simple electric switch.

name: Tesla Coil
description: An electrical trap that zaps nearby players when powered. More power supplied will result in higher damage. Loses durability with use.

name: Timer
description: A Timer switch, will pass power through for duration.

name: XOR Switch
description: An exclusive-or logic gate that allows electrical passthrough if ONLY ONE input receives power, passthrough amount is whichever single input is active. if BOTH inputs recieve power, passthrough will be zero.

name: Electrical Branch
description: This object allows you to branch power off from a main line by a set amount.

name: Root Combiner
description: This object combines two root electrical sources into a single signal. Helpful for stringing together low energy batteries or solar panels to produce higher power output. Can be wired in series, can not be used with any non energy producing electrical components.

name: Memory Cell
description: A 1 bit storage component. SET input will set the value to 1 CLEAR input sets the value to 0. Output will provide connected power if value is 1, Inverted output will provide connected power if value is 0. This is also known as a D-Type Flip Flop

name: Elevator
description: A powered elevator. Place another elevator above or below this to connect it. Requires power.

name: Satchel Charge
description: Small explosive package constructed of beancan grenades. Useful for destroying wood and sheet metal doors.

name: Timed Explosive Charge
description: C4, useful for breaking into bases.

name: Explosives
description: A component used for crafting C4 and Rockets.

name: Factory Door
description: Medium strength door, vulnerable to explosives. Contains a bulletproof viewing portal

name: Animal Fat
description: Harvested from animals, combine with cloth to create a low quality fuel source.

name: Fertilizer
description: Helps plants grow by increasing ground condition. Produced in a composter.

name: Stone Fireplace

name: Orange Boomer
description: A very large mortar type firework with an orange starburst

name: Violet Boomer
description: A very large mortar type firework with a violet starburst

name: Violet Volcano Firework
description: Emits a beautiful shower of Violet sparks

description: A hatch that opens and changes into a ladder.

description: Slightly faster, slightly weaker.Combined at a Frankenstein Table to create your very own monster.
